    • Management

      public Management​(Profile profile, double salary, int role)
      Overloaded constructor receives Profile, salary, and role.
      Parameters:
      profile - The profile of the employee.
      salary - The employee's salary.
      role - The role of the employee (1 for manager, 2 for department head, 3 for director).

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overridden toString() method. Returns a String with relevant information regarding the employee.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Fulltime
      Returns:
      A String containing the Employee's name, department, date hired, fulltime status, annual salary, management role, and bonus compensation.
